name: chefdash
tagline: chefdash is a simple dashboard for tracking Chef runs across a cluster.
body:
With chefdash you can:

* Run `chef-client` on all nodes in a Chef environment simultaneously, or on a single node
* View output in realtime and quickly see if any nodes failed

Check the [Readme](https://github.com/sidebolt/chefdash/blob/master/README.md) for details and install instructions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
